title: He Knows
author: Mary G. Brainard
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c

v1: I know not what awaits me,
And o'er each step of my onward way
He makes new scenes to rise;
And every joy He sends me comes
v2: One step I see before me,
The light of heav'n more brightly shines
And sweetly through the silence comes
v3: He holds me with His own right hand,
And will not let me go,
And lulls my troubled soul to rest
In Him who loves me so.
v4: So on I go not knowing;
I would not if I might;
I'd rather walk in the dark with God
Than go alone in the light;
I'd rather walk by faith with Him
c1: Where He may lead I'll follow,
And every hour in perfect peace,
And every hour in perfect peace,
